colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (ZHES PA 'DI NI JANG @006A *, ,JONG CHEN WANG GI THU ZHI MEL TZAS SANG TAR HANG THO YON CHOS SBYOR ZHES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES PA'I NGOR, BYANG PHYOGS KYI RGYAL BSTAN GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'I DGE BAS RANG GZHAN LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU BYON,)
